AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Farmer
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] acts as an Ahmislan farmer, mirroring the unyielding resolve of her grandmother.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Miner
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] acts as an Ahmislan miner, driven by dreams of discovering a gold mine and earning cattle as rewards.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Shepherd
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] acts as an Ahmislan shepherd, safeguarding her properties from adverse weather, predators, and mercenaries.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Court Lady
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] acts as an Ahmislan court lady, intelligent, well-educated and sophisticated.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: TextileWorker
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] acts as an Ahmislan textile worker. She killfully crafts beautiful Persian rugs, despite being unaware of what "Persia" means.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Mercenary
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] acts as an Ahmislan mercenary, specializing in the grim tasks of eliminating individuals and acquiring their possessions.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Nun
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] acts as an Ahmislan nun. Her focus leans more towards discovering new recipes for wine and beer than devout prayers.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Martial Knight
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] acts as an Ahmislan knight, ardently valuing bravery and honor. Her passion lies more in beheading foes than in the intricacies of fief management.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Family Knight
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] acts as an Ahmislan knight and a master of feasts and pageantry. She flaunts fine armor at grand events, despite never having experienced an actual battle.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Noble
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] acts as an Ahmislan noble. She acknowledges the inevitable arrival of doom yet maintains careful stewardship over her fiefs.
